original_text: After the earthquake, there was a fire. But the Lord was not in the fire. After the fire, there was a very quiet voice.
korean_text: 또 지진 후에 불이 있으나 불 가운데에도 여호와께서 계시지 아니하더니 불 후에 세미한 소리가 있는지라

sentences.original_text: But the Lord was not in the fire
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 주는 불 가운데 계시지 않았다

sentences.original_text: there was a very quiet voice
